thread.title: I-75/US Route 6 bridge work to begin and end this weekend
thread.title_full: I-75/US Route 6 bridge work to begin and end this weekend

author: 13abc
title: I-75/US Route 6 bridge work to begin and end this weekend
text:
Related Links ODOT Website Restriction Map TOLEDO, Ohio (13abc Action News) - The Ohio Department of Transportation (ODOT) plans to begin and end construction on the U.S. Route 6 Bridge in Wood County this weekend.
ODOT says that this would be the first project ever where an interstate bridge was removed and replaced over the course of a weekend.
This work is a part of the Interstate 75 widening project from Perrysburg to Findlay.
Below is a description from ODOT of the maintenance of traffic.
Interstate 75 at U.S. Route 6 in Wood County
Two lanes of traffic on I-75 at US 6 will be maintained during the weekend of October 16 through October 19. Short-term overnight lane restrictions are possible
Effective Friday, October 16 at 7pm, through Monday, October 19 at 6am, one lane of southbound I-75 traffic will use the exit/entrance ramps at US 6 (Exit 197); the other lane of southbound I-75 will use the northbound side of I-75 over US 6 and be separated by a barrier wall.
Effective Friday, October 16 at 7pm, through Monday, October 19 at 6am, the following ramps will be closed:
• The ramp from southbound I-75 to eastbound US 6. Detour: Cygnet Road (Exit 171); SR 25; SR 281; SR 199; US 6.
• The ramp from southbound I-75 to westbound US 6. Detour: Cygnet Road (Exit 171); SR 25; US 6.
• The ramp from northbound I-75 to westbound US 6. Detour: Cygnet Road (Exit 171); SR 25; US 6.
• The ramp from eastbound US 6 to north and southbound I-75. Detour: SR 25; Cygnet Road; I-75.
• The ramp from westbound US 6 to north and southbound I-75. Detour: SR 199; SR 281; SR 25; Cygnet Road; I-75.
The ramp from northbound I-75 to eastbound US 6 (Exit 197) will remain open.
U.S. Route 6 at Interstate 75
Effective Friday, October 16 at 7pm, through Monday, October 19 at 6am, US 6, between SR 25 and Dunbridge Road, will be closed for the I-75 bridge slide.
• Eastbound US 6 detour: SR 25; Cygnet Road; northbound I-75; US 6.
• Westbound US 6 detour: SR 199; SR 281; SR 25; US 6.
